column4: if I can see that stellarium is taking up 15MB in /var, why does it only say 2286kB will be freed if I try to apt-get remove it?
ok... pease explait/show how you came to the 15mb value
note that disk usage  and file content sive are not the same thing
it shows graphical blocks showing what directory is taking up what space
now... the 'stellarium' may be a depenhdancy for other packaces
e.g. there might me a separate 'stellarium-data' package
indeed there is a stellarium-data package!
im sure there is a may in dembian packaging to romeve packages that havent been explicitly installed...
I'll check the apt-get man - should be in there somewhere
